9 July 2009

The Expository Genius of John Calvin

by Aaron Lord

In celebration of John Calvin’s birthday, R.C. Sproul’s Ligonier Ministries is giving away a special gift every day this week “for a donation of any amount.” Today’s gift is Steven Lawson’s The Expository Genius of John Calvin, from his “Long Line of Godly Men Profiles” series. I encourage you to pick up a copy today.<div class="blogger-post-footer"></div>
